website_summaries.verdict: A long-time favorite brand with an improved formula that cleans effectively and is affordable.
pros: Easy to spray on and wipe clean without excessive scrubbing in most cases
Can be used in warm or cold ovens
Results in as little as 5 minutes
cons: Nozzle can quit working before the can is empty

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on grills
customer_reviews.text: Used it to clean a Weber Genesis and it ruined the enameled finish.
customer_reviews.author: SigGuy938

customer_reviews.title: Must have product..exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is one product which really exceeded my expectations... After applying this product and leaving it for two hours, it made all the sticky oil as semi liquid which you can clean with your bare hands. Do use a mask while applying though.
customer_reviews.author: Suman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for Grill Grates
customer_reviews.text: I tried 6 different products before trying this one. Simple Green, Green Monster, Formula 88, Zep Grill Cleaner, Easy Off Regular Grill cleaner and others; by far this is the best one of all. I am the type of person who prefers cleaning the grill immediately after grilling. Other products worked fine, but this one does not require me to use any elbow grease. It loosens the debris off the grates easily and comes off easily. I like easy practical cleaning without the need to spend much time scrubbing. Try it, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Fmcasado

customer_reviews.title: Worked WONDERS but I wouldn't say it's fume free. ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked WONDERS but I wouldn't say it's fume free. The fumes are much preferable to other chemicals but do make sure you're room is well ventilated. I tried all natural first, letting dawn & vinegar & baking soda sit over night and it just didn't touch the embarrassing mess in my oven. This stuff, after sitting for just 15 minutes, wiped it all right off. My major complaint with this product is how difficult it is to get all the cleaner residue off when you're done. Every time I'd rinse & wipe it clean and then use the oven, a white residue would reappear. Scary to think what is getting into my baked foods :(
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Label
customer_reviews.text: I was intending to use this “Oven & Grill Cleaner” to clean the inside of my grill and to my surprise the instructions clearly state in bold letters “DO NOT USE ON GRILL EXTERIOR, INTERIOR, OR COMPONENTS”. Had I known this I would not have purchased it and feel that the wording on the label is misleading and instead should have said that it is for the only cleaning of of the grates. Even with Amazon’s very return policies I will keep it for cleaning my oven at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not for the faint of heart or those who like breathing
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner did clean well but I thought I might suffocate while using it, even with following the instructions very carefully. Make sure to use in an EXTREMELY well ventilated area - wide open windows with a cross breeze and fans, and still try not to breathe in. After one attempted spray, I skipped the step of the directions to slightly preheat the oven, and the reaction of the cleaner was much less severe on a cold surface. It still seemed to clean okay with some scrubbing (use thick gloves!). I won't ever buy this again; it was recommended on a landlord's move out cleaning list, but I'll opt for a bit more scrubbing with a normal strength product.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Interesting that you cant clean the inside of your grill with the Grill Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Pretty annoying that you cant use something called “Oven and Grill Cleaner” to clean the inside of a grill. Apparently it is an Oven and Grill GRATE Cleaner. Probably should be advertised as such.
customer_reviews.author: DMarshall

customer_reviews.title: Oven grease cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Ditch the baking powder and whatever else you have been using! I used this product in my oven and it did wonders. I followed the instructions and I chose to pre-heat my oven to 200• then I sprayed the cleaner. I left it on for about 10-15 minutes and when I wiped it with my wet rag, the grease stains came off instantly. I was done cleaning in about 20mins I hardly even cleaned my oven that fast before.
customer_reviews.author: iye

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible product
customer_reviews.text: There so much wrong with this stuff idk where to begin! First the can is finicky to use. If you even tilt or angle it at all it won't spray much out. The formula isn't thick at all it's very water. The claim on the can of it being able to clean in 3 minutes is a joke. It's good for really light surface crud at best. It's no match for a grill/oven that actually gets used. And don't you dare get this on your skin because it will never come off again. It leaves an oily residue that's impossible to wash off! There's way better options at the local Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Tambunga

customer_reviews.title: easy off with the yellow cap
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle in a can!!!! I used it to clean up OLD Cast iron fry pan, sprayed, sealed it in a plastic garbage bag x 4 days, 80% of the gunk came off, did a 2nd dose, sealed, waited, looks Great! Also used it on my old fav stainless steel fry pan botton, bagged it, next day was able to use a teflon scraper to very easily remove the build on gunk, So then I tried it on the oven door, MIRACLE in 20 min. Then on an old oil stain in the driveway 4 hours later scrubbed it right off. I will never be without this Easy off heavy duty, YELLOW cap cleaner. love it....
customer_reviews.author: Cathy N.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend- OMG
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’m so excited about this product I stopped half way through to write this review. I’m extremely impressed! I did four things: 1) preheat oven to 200 2) spray cleaner on oven surface 3) wait 10 minutes 4) use a sponge and water to wipe off Unbelievable how quick and effortless cleaning was with this product. Such a great find!!!
customer_reviews.author: PurpleGold

customer_reviews.title: Huge Price Increase!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully! My stove has never been cleaner. However, I have no idea why the price suddenly went up so much! I bought this for $6.95 and when I came back to buy more, the price had increased to $17.32 and after a couple weeks, it is now at $20.74. THAT'S INSANE!! No reason for such a huge price increase. This product definitely works, but I will not pay that much money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Nice hefty can of a product that just does not want come out of the can when depressing the aerosol button. Most of the product that did come out of the nozzle dribbled down the can and into my hand which was holding the can. The product that actually did make it into the target worked good enough. Defective can? Most likely but this isn’t the 1st time this has occurred with this brand of oven cleaner. No more!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Bag a Donuts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to achieve a pristine clean
customer_reviews.text: This really is a miracle product for years of baked on oven gunk. I used the self-clean option twice before resorting to this and wish I had never wasted my time with self clean. Pros: it does exactly what it’s supposed to on the worst of the worst baked on stuff. Cons: the fumes will disintegrate your lungs or skin so use with severe caution! I followed instructions to a T, used all protective gear and even took grates outside to spray to help with fumes. Due to slight breeze, some micro droplets got on my arm and it burned after only a short time. Just be careful and be happy with your pristine clean oven!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my grill.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my Charbroils aftermarket Stainless Steel grates. It removes anything within minutes and they look like new. One word of caution, spray it outside, stand upwind, this will choke you if you breathe it. Also wear rubber gloves. I will give your skin the same feel that bleach does. But it is an awesome cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Defective can
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product many times. This particular cameras defective & sprayed everywhere. It was an unpleasant burn on my legs. I purchased new can in a store with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: jbgmarine

customer_reviews.title: Beware it will take away the shiness of chrome
customer_reviews.text: It works but also damages other stuff. First of all, the odor is SO SO STRONG, I had to hold my breath while spraying, then walked away for some fresh air then came back to spray some more. Second, the spray is suck! If you tilt the bottle, it wont spray out much, have to have it straight up. Last, I should have read all the detail discription of the product, it's ruin my sink and now I have to buy other product to hopefully shine it back again. Luckily I didnt try it on my top stove.
customer_reviews.author: PLam

customer_reviews.title: CAREFUL! Cleans well but fumes are serious.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was purchasing a fume-free home grade product but this is definitely professional grade with massively powerful fumes. This cleaned my oven very well but I wouldn’t be comfortable using this in my home again, I ended up with mild chemical burns on my hands and a massive cough from the fumes. I was able to get my animals away and the house aired out but this feels like a more obvious warning would be needed!!! I think a warning card in the box would be very helpful as I did not realize how dangerous this product actually was.
customer_reviews.author: Christian & Brooke Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good but maybe dangerous
customer_reviews.text: It is great to clean but: - I damaged my oven - it has horrible smell. I'm afraid it can be toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Vakhtang Koroghlishvili

customer_reviews.title: Not good for countertop oven
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is not suitable for countertop oven. As instructed, preheat, cool down a min. Spray inside the oven wall, wait 5-10min. Clean up with wet cloth. Turns out it ruins my oven, the black coating came off and it keep white stain everywhere. Now my oven looks 5 years older.
customer_reviews.author: sleepypungpung

customer_reviews.title: If only the cap could be designed better
customer_reviews.text: It surely does what it says, removing all the long-existing oily debris with a 10 mins waiting and a damp sponge. Wish I knew this product last year so I could save that good Saturday morning for something more pleasant instead of cleaning hard against the oven top and the mission impossible oven. The only thing negative about it is that it can somehow leave white wash-off-like spots on black plastic and the cap is really a pain. You might want to cover the plastic part to avoid these spots.
customer_reviews.author: S.H

customer_reviews.title: Weak propellant!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The spray is VERY WEAK! I’m sure the propellant will run out WAY BEFORE the product does ☹️😕😟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean my grill as everyone swore by it. I ignored others advice and the directions about spraying it on the painted surface and must admit, I messed up. It will absolutely take the painted finish off the grill but it cleaned everything inside the grill perfectly. Just understand that people are not lying when they say not to spray it on the painted surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: When this says 3 mins it means 3 minutes! It is one of the best and most powerful oven cleaners out there (in my opinion). It makes cleaning my clients oven a breeze, no scrubbing and scraping. Baked on grease and food literally wipes off after three minutes. The fumes are strong so use in an area with own windows and wear a mask. Well worth it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Graham-Treston

customer_reviews.title: Watch overspray.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use my self-clean feature with the racks left in the oven. I bought this cleaner to spray on the shelves. Worked very well. layered newspaper on Formica table and followed can directions. Had very little areas to touch-up with steel wool. Racks were clean and ready to reinstall before oven was ready for them. Saved tons of elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Mechanic239

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. And arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing! I followed the instructions and let it sit for about 30 min so that it would get everything off the first go around. And it sure did! Just used the scrub side of the sponge and all the years of baked on food wipped right off. It does have a strong odor, I opened up some windows and doors and turned some fans on the smell was out of my house sortly after I finished cleaning up the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: It actually works! It has a very strong citrus chemical scent, but it works. Every time I would bake or cook the fire alarms would go off because the caked-on grease from the previous tenant would begin to burn and smoke. I used to this and it lifted the grease right off, minor scrubbing but for the most part it easily wiped right off with a cloth. I haven’t had the issue since!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This works almost too good. Use gloves and wash your hands immediately if you touch it. I was able to get every bit of grease out of the inside of my oven. It also took the dark burnt on rings off of my glass stovetop
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great product for messy tenants
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Pre heat oven to 200 degrees. Turn off oven. Spray everywhere needed. Close the door wait 5 mins and wipe clean. Easiest cleaner I’ve ever used and since I have a ton of mask now I grabbed one of those and my rubber gloves just to keep the product off my hands. Will smell but I have windows in the kitchen so cleared out quickly for me.
customer_reviews.author: A SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: HAZARDOUS,but WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Watch out. This stuff is potent. Used it on the outside of my Weber, on the stainless steel parts that were stained from food. It took care of that, I wouldn't use it on the inside though, or anything enameled. Be careful, it removed some of the text/indicator display. CAUTION: Don't use on graphics text on our grill, or it will take it right off...
customer_reviews.author: WVUDave + Wife

customer_reviews.title: Not the best one and averagely effective
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these takes out stain better than others. Effort is almost as same as before. But since I didn't had any other spray so I am good with this. But please consider other options too.
customer_reviews.author: Atul Singh

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF IS AMAZING. Tiktok made me buy it and I grabbed it for my boyfriends land that hes had for a million years. He uses too much oil when he cooks so the bottom is CAKEDDDDD in rusty, crusty stuff. I sprayed this stuff on and waited about an hour and then just wiped all of it right off. I did two coats just for my own satisfaction but seriously.. this will get ANYTHING off.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Impressed and v much happy
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt very sure when my friend recommended this easy off clean. The inside of my oven was v v messy. Grease and food was burned n stuck to the bottom n sides. I used some other cleaners but never actually got cleaned I am amazed by the ease of use, the results n everything about it. I have used liberally and still havnt used up quarter of the can. For this price and results its the best cleaner i have got my hands on :) P.S: i should have taken a before picture as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Awais Maqbool

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time after trying other chemicals. It works very well. It does have an odor that will take your breath away but it warns you of the chemicals. If you open your door and window and use a mask, you will be fine. I felt it much worth it. There was little to no elbow grease and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great but strong!
customer_reviews.text: Wear gloves!!! And protect your cabinets!!! This works great but I couldn’t get my gloves in right and i took them off. Big mistake, they peeled for days. Also, consider the fumes free version. This is very strong and can make you cough for a while. I also wiped the stove off and some foam ended up in my cabinets and it almost damaged the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Santos

customer_reviews.title: Works well just MAKE SURE to have a mask and gloves
customer_reviews.text: Found an old grill on the side of the road. Used this stuff to clean it and it worked great! Don’t use it on any stainless steel or you’ll risk ruining it. Only recommendation is to make sure you have a steel brush to scrape the grates and make sure to wear gloves and a mask as the chemicals are dangerous to breathe in and touch for long periods of time. I had a water hose to rinse it off about 5 mins after each spray down as the grease would dry quickly if I waited longer then 5 mins. Overall worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer W.

customer_reviews.title: Magic sprayer! Definitely try it.
customer_reviews.text: My pot’s bottom was all black, I used to wiped my life out on this pot bottom but nothing changed. I used a lot of cleansers, all of them don’t work at all! Until I got this item, it is magic! You just sprayed it on the pot, leave it for 10 minutes. Slightly wipe it, the darkness oil used to stick tight on the pot become up floated. Slightly wipe will make them completely gone! I even sprayed it on the wall, great effect, I didn’t know the wall is that dirty. However, you may not want to do that because when I wiped the wall, it takes wall skin fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Curry

customer_reviews.title: If it didn't work for you, you're doing it wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've never found anything that worked this good! I preheat the oven for 200 degrees like the instructions say and sprayed down the oven, dropped my kid off at school and came back. I wiped the glass front and EVERYTHING came off! The burnt on grease has been caked on for about a year. I hate cleaning and this was so easy, no scrubbing needed. Wear thick rubber gloves and a mask because it is so strong it will burn your nose hairs and fingers off!
customer_reviews.author: christopher r bergman

customer_reviews.title: expired can?
customer_reviews.text: i received this order on 10/10/17 and the bottom of the can expiration date is 9/6/17... anyhow i gave this can a try figure the date is not that far off... just a bit peeved they would send out a old can... just like all the other reviews, this can does give off a strong fume... made me cough while spraying...however, it does work. Lifted all the stains and made it easy to wipe off the years of grease
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This product is very powerful to remove the old oil stains on the glass surface including the top of the kitchen range and grill pan. However, its smell is really irritative and corrosive, and the skin on my leg was peeled off when one drop of its liquid fell on it. Pay great attention to self-protection when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Gets the grease off
customer_reviews.text: Takes all the grease out from the charcoal grill that I use. It takes some time to clean but this product definitely makes the grill sparkling again (and I can see the metal again). The only thing I would fix is that it takes around 40 min wait time after spraying it on to wipe clean with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: chumgadad

customer_reviews.title: Your oven will sparkle like it did on the showroom floor
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product 100 stars. The grease dissolved instantly. It was extremely easy and I didn’t have to use any elbow grease. This was the first time I cleaned my oven in the 14 years I had. I am seriously shocked it worked. I had a very thick layer of burnt on food on the stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Really really works to take off years of grime.
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a new apartment recently, and you know NYC landlords. Always trying to save a buck while taking yours. The oven was a DISASTER when I moved in. Looked like it had never been cleaned once. I used this product in the entire oven and left it for about 45 minutes, and after wiping it clean it looked like a completely different oven! The inside of my oven is blue, who knew!
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean our heavy greased oven. For the price, I though it would work better and easily remove the buildup of gunk on the sides and bottom. I had to apply and wipe and then re-apply multiple times to get it clean and it took a while. The oven cleaner gets the job done but its similar to other cleaners. I thought it would be easier.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I refuse to admit how long it is since I cleaned my ovens. However, I needed to give them a freshen up. I sprayed and left for about an hour. The caked-on grease wiped off with ease. I was impressed. There was a little left behind but with how much was on to start I would have been shocked otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: E.S

customer_reviews.title: Easy is for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed inside a filthy cold oven and walked away... 2 hours later got to the task (ugh!) and wiped away 99% of grime! followed with a dish soapy water wash. The fumes were strong when I sprayed but hardly noticeable after it had set those 2 hours. Big can, will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: C. DeJong

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven & Grill Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This oven and grill cleaner is easy to use and sprays a thick cleanser onto the surface. After sitting for a few minutes, the cleanser makes it much easier to remove burnt or stuck on grease! We love using this on our BBQ grill and over when we clean them thoroughly. Makes the job much easier!
customer_reviews.author: matt steel

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean the top of my gas stove, pans that have burnt on grease and my grease. Really works good on room temp surfaces but you must let it sit for at least 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: burnt thumbs

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I’d tried a different kind previously and realized that this works a lot better. I didn’t need to scrub or reapply. It simply works great. Just wish they could do something about the odor. It’s not strong, but I think I’ll wear a face mask next time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it works.
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH. I wish I had a before and after to show side by side. I’m exhausted but that’s to be expected after not cleaning my oven for 11 YEARS. Shame on me. So I really had to put the elbow grease into this endeavor... 3.5 hours later there is the finished product, looking like a brand new oven. The lung inhalation injury, nausea and dizziness were worth it! This product and a little steel wool cut through over a decade of baked-on crud.
customer_reviews.author: Kastle F Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: worked great! Spray, wait 3-5 mins and wipe! Obviously you have to use some elbow grease in some areas. But over all, I was done with my oven in 40 mins! (Yes I timed myself). The smell wasn’t as strong as then other products I have used in the past, but still crack a window and air out the house.
customer_reviews.author: Latif04

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed!!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased our home last year and the renters who lived at our place before bought it did not deep clean anything. Our oven looked like a disaster inside. Saw the reviews on easy off and to give it a shot. I put on a face masks, gloves, and opened the windows for ventilation before applying. Let it sit for 3 hours and went to clean it off, just melted all the build up over the years off. I would highly recommend this product, but recommend wearing a mask and gloves.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Witchcraft
customer_reviews.text: I don’t what kind of witchcraft this is, but I’m obsessed. I had minor scratches and water burns all over my glass stovetop (in a rental apartment), one use and they were alllllll gone! I tried everything you could think of and this was the only thing that worked. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Fortich

customer_reviews.title: Wear a mask and even goggles
customer_reviews.text: This product works, but I am floored that the bottle doesn't mention anything about protecting your face with gear. You must. It's way more important than wearing gloves. I nearly choked on the fumes and I had two windows open and an exhaust fan on.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Correa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Did not clean our grill. The plant based Method cleaner worked better. This stinks bad too and is very hard to spray on. You have to hold it at just the right angle and very little comes out even then. Would not recommend. I’ve used the great value version before and it worked way better.
customer_reviews.author: Bailee Finnie

customer_reviews.title: Once a year grill magic
customer_reviews.text: This product is like cheating. I put my grill parts in a black trash bag and then spray them with this juice leaving it to sit overnight then hose it off. Most stains and gunk comes off. The fumes will give you a head rush if you get a good whiff so look out for that.
customer_reviews.author: P'Rick

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what it says!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently just bought a house. The stove is pretty new, but the inside of oven is kind of dirty. So i used this to clean it. It did it. I dont have before and after picture, but it DOES the job. I cant get rid of the very old stain, but most of them are gone. Please make sure you wear a mask when spraying, because it irritated if you inhale.
customer_reviews.author: qinmin149

customer_reviews.title: Great if not for the shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great stuf but for some reason it won't spray after used only 70% of it . Im guessing can somehow got damaged in shipping. WARNING DO NOT SNIFF OR BREATH THIS IN its have some kind of acid in it and will most likely damage your lungs .
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lox

customer_reviews.title: Easy Off Smells Bad But Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the main brand that is used to help get your oven clean and back to shiny and new but not so Easy Off. You need to let it sit much longer than recommended and make sure the room is ventilated. It has a horrible smell as well. It works but you do still have to scrub at it.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. I heated the oven to 200 degrees, turned it off, applied product and waited 20 minutes. Cleaned with one application, except one spot I had to spray again and wait. It worked the second time. Easiest time I ever had cleaning the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product worked really well for me in my oven on my stove and even some old pots and pans that had grime on it that I couldn't get off. I highly recommend this product. When you spray it just make sure your arm is extended. The first couple of times I sprayed it in a pan in my sink I ended up choking on the fumes.
customer_reviews.author: BOREDrightNOW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked like magic! Will always use this to clean our grill. Havent cleaned it in over 2 years and this made it look brand new again! The spray didnt come out as fast as I wish it would since you dont want to inhale the fumes but over all it worked well and had plenty to clean the whole grill.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So it smells horrible and it’s really Annoying to scrub your oven at any juncture in one’s life . However, it got some pretty tough stains out Of my oven that have probably been there for years , so no complaints ..
customer_reviews.author: Chana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for glass stovetop!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to get water burns off my glass electric stove top and it worked like magic! You spray a generous amount on there, let it dry completely (8-24hrs), then wipe it off with wet paper towels. It truly amazed me how well it worked!! The only thing that’s holding me back is the scent. It is super chemically and I had to cover my face when I was using it because it’s STRONG. Works amazing, so the fumes are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works well but makes you dizzy if you do not wear a mask
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, it worked alright but it made me really dizzy... I had to call my doctor in order to figure out if I’m ok. I couldn’t see clearly for like an hour :( yet, it did make my oven clean. Make sure to wear a mask, they don’t state you have to on the instructions, but unless you’d love to be dizzy and not be able to see clearly for about an hour, get a face mask and try to not get too close to the product and whatever you do do not breathe bar the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larysa Marienko

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff I have found for flat stove top surfaces. Spray it on and let dry. Then an easy wioe off and it takes off all the gunk. I have used really expensive cleaners that never even worked. This stuff is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Nattlie Monjay

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean my oven. I wish I would have taken pictures. It had 2 years of nastiness. It's blue all throughout the inside and you would not have guessed that. I sprayed it down and left overnight. Everything came right off. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: BlazedGex

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is a stupid thing to be writing a review about, but I'm impressed. I had an oven that hadn't been cleaned in at least a decade and this took care of it in 10 minutes. Pre-heat oven, spray, let it sit, and wipe it off. I had a few stubborn spots I had to scrub with a sponge, but honestly, 99.9% of it came off with just a paper towel. Wear gloves, because the sludge that comes off is disgusting and you don't want that on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is an absolutely must! I use this on my glass stove and it’s been the only effective cleaner I’ve found. I also use this on my Ninja grill to clean up baked on food bits. This will be a must have for me moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: candyse

customer_reviews.title: It reall Easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on the difficult to clean racks and it makes cleaning a breeze! Just put the oven rack in a kitchen garbage bag, spray, close it up and leave over night. Next day just rinse it off in the sink!!
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: As I remember!!
customer_reviews.text: Have not needed oven cleaner for a long time as have self cleaning oven. My husband decided to do some cooking. Although I love that fact!!!.....there was a mess in the oven self-cleaning did not work on. It is taking several applications...leaving on overnight (twice) but it is finally coming clean. Yeah!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL and effective
customer_reviews.text: Powerful product. It will loosen the most stubborn, burnt on food and grease. USE WITH PLENTY OF VENTILATION! The only downside of this product is the fumes but that it expected from a product as effective as this.
customer_reviews.author: PaSoccerDad

customer_reviews.title: Works within 5 min
customer_reviews.text: Works fast. I used it in my grill and the grease and burnt in stuff was falling off within 5 minutes. It makes a horrible job not so horrible. I would still use it outside though due to fumes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Grill Means BBQ Cooking Racks Only, Not The Cookbox
customer_reviews.text: Warning for BBQ cleaning; it is only to be used on the cooking racks after removal. I bought this to clean the inside of the grill body, however the directions note that it is only for the cooking racks. I wouldn’t have bought if I knew this tidbit.
customer_reviews.author: lisa lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I sprayed some on my grill
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I sprayed some on my grill, waited 5 minutes, and wiped it away. In the past, I tried some Weber-brand grill cleaner that did nothing. This stuff made my grill look factory fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Dysfunctional sprayer?
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep shaking the can in order for it to spray. Even then the spray is not consistent. It fluctuates between a light spray and spraying fumes. Most of the times the actual cleaner is foaming down the can vs being sprayed out the nozzle. I have tried to clean the nozzle and made sure the arrow and red dot were aligned. Nothing seems to get it to work. We were left inhaling noxious fumes even when outside. I don't think I will buy this again and just stick to the original.
customer_reviews.author: Henney

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love using heavy chemicals, but this is the only thing that removes the thick build up on the bottom of my oven. I try to use it just once or twice a year but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Logan M

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Product works greats. Applied it before bed & simply wiped away all the grease in the morning. The fumes are very strong when applying; be sure to wear a mask & have others avoid the kitchen when applying.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: All dirt came off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, spray over the surface let it sit for 30 - 60 minutes, I scrub it off using sponge. For more sticky stains, i used the 'steel coil wire ball' . It works well.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Starts working before you do
customer_reviews.text: Just spray it on and wait a few minutes before scrubbing. It really helps to remove old baked on grease. Didn’t get 100 percent of the grease off, but it works better than other products.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Martinez

customer_reviews.title: very fume
customer_reviews.text: I always buy the fume free Easy-off brand to use in my oven and grill, however this time I wanted give it a try for this one since it says specifically for grill. I made a mistake...the fume got all over my kitchen and it is very toxic. I can't literally breath while using it. It does clean faster than the blue one. Does it worth get all the fume in your face? Certainly not. I still rather get the fume free and let it sit for longer time on the over/grill.
customer_reviews.author: Pericles

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I received this on August 11, I just used it today and it had no pressure. I was unable to spray it and get the cleaner out. Disappointed because I know it’s a good product. Bud Terrell
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works 👌 Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product is trusted magic. You spray, leave on or leave overnight and then just wet wipe away. I have no regrets amd you wont be disappointed. Sorry i didnt take a pic of the grill amd oven but damn it makes them shine again without too much hard work
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Stove top savior
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING FOR YOUR STOVE TOP. spray it on your crusty glass stove tops and leave it over night until it completely dries (for best results) and wipe it off with wet towel. It'll look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ahn

customer_reviews.title: Your grease stains won't stand a chance against this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well. It's pretty strong so I recommend using a face mask. The senct is fine (lemon) but it doesn't really matter since it's so strong. It easily cleaned an entire oven full of caked on oil and grease. Also cleaned a grease filled barbecue like new. Just leave it on for a while, even overnight. On parts with thicker layers of grease it took a few applications but it removed everything.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product but i believe not stored properly
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing there’s no doubt, easy off gets the job done, the only reason that I gave 4 stars to this is because the can lost pressure and I had to throw that out in the garbage with half of product still in the can.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Eduardo Moraes

customer_reviews.title: i recommend wearing a face mask
customer_reviews.text: i recommend wearing a face mask. the fumes are very pungent. also maybe some safety googles. the fumes made me tear up. i do not like that you have to constantly shake the can
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Tran

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a defective product..
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 3 stars because the the spray can is defective. Just received it yesterday and when I just opened the box and was instantly about to put it to use only to see the nozzle is pushed down all the way and because of that it won’t spray correctly or even spray at all. I tried to use it regardless but all that comes out is a tiny spatter and a tiny bit of foam and then it won’t spray. The product it self is good it’s just the can that doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Nicole hammitt

customer_reviews.title: Best on tough grease
customer_reviews.text: The scent is waaaaay too strong but it's the best product out there for easily removing anything from dirty oven. I use it on my mini grills and stove top as well and it's magic
customer_reviews.author: Q Family

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably effective
customer_reviews.text: Pretty effective although for true carbonation needs more than one applications. Do outside or in an open garage, smell is bad and very irritating. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Iliya Khramov

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazingly. I used the cold option. Sprayed my oven let it sit for 20 minutes absolutely everything wiped completely out with a sponge and water. Definitely a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Ashle_h

customer_reviews.title: To cover face from chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too strong, so, I would recommend to wear a mask to protect face, works great, does the job in as little as 15-20 minutes on average to great mess, even after leaving overnight
customer_reviews.author: miaisall

customer_reviews.title: Expired Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this spray on September 23, 2018. I tried to use it today but it no enough presser. The expiration date was on 16/08/18
customer_reviews.author: Emrys

customer_reviews.title: Strips and damages aluminum and stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toaster oven and it completely ruined the oven. This strips all chrome and will corrode aluminum. Be sure to reap the whole label before using.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Woo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is some awesome stuff. I didn't believe how easy the crud was removed after letting in sit over night with no heat. And trust, I haven't clean that stove in years. Make sure it's the professional, because the regular will have you scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my oven of course and for my glass top stove, spray on, let stand and just wipe off all that junk that's burnt on, excellent
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This did a great job of doing what it’s supposed to do. Just use it when you will be away for a few hours because of the fumes, but it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Bret barnard

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s really toxic I had to wear mask and glasses. When I first tried to spray without a protective equipment it stung my eyes and hurt my throat.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: great for removing lots of grease and gunk from your oven
customer_reviews.text: my husband was dreading cleaning the oven because it's been a while. he purchased this to make it easier for him and this product is amazing. it's great for removing lots of grease and gunk from your oven. our oven has never been this clean.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Why did the price of this get jacked up?
customer_reviews.text: Why did the price of this get jacked up? This used to be under $10 for a can, and now it's over $20? Why? It's a good product, but not that good. CamelCamelCamel website shows this dramatic price jump starting at the beginning of August, so it doesn't seem Covid related. Prime Now has this for $4.89 a can, what's causing the disparity?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Preslin

product_meta.title: Easy-Off Professional Oven & Grill Cleaner, 24 oz Can
product_meta.description: Easy-Off Professional Oven & Grill Cleaner has an advanced grease-cutting formula that is effective against burned-on grease and grime. Spot cleans in 3 minutes! This heavy-duty oven & grill cleaner is great for everyday spot cleaning. It can be used to clean a wide variety of surfaces and equipment including warm and cold ovens. Use on ovens, broilers and barbecue grills.
feature_bullets: Heavy Duty Oven & Grill Cleaner cleans tough baked-on spills quickly.
The advanced grease-cutting formula is effective against burned-on grease and grime.
Ideal for cleaning: ovens, broilers, and barbecue grills.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
